99.9% of the people we searched for never got rescued at all wise ass . And=
 the people that risked thier lives 
like myself are dyeing a slow death fr=
om the poisons that were there so it still has not claimed all it's victims=
 !
 
Bruce

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team 


To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups.comFrom: erick_hunter9@...: Fri, 16 Nov 2007 08:06:20 -0=
800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] for rod or eric or whatever your name is





I s=
ure put sparks in your day,  didn't I?  And you still missed my point entir=
ely.  BTW, I'm a New Orleans Katrina survivor.  We didn't get rescued for 4=
 days.  God bless.          --Rod
 
 
Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@...> =
wrote:




I agree!Frank R.

 <franks-boxes@...>To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comSent: Friday, Novembe=
r 16, 2007 8:03:29 AMSubject: RE: [EVP-ITC] for rod or eric or whatever you=
r name is

 One last word, that's why I don't like Paranormal Invetigators,=
 and ghost hunts. These people have no clue about spirit, and about real sp=
irit communcation, they have a paradigm they live by, and that's that all g=
hosts are like the Hollywood version, and nothing else exists. They ignore =
all contrary evidence, yet make enough noise that the lay public believes t=
hem to be the true experts. Nuff said!  Frank
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .comF=
rom: paranormalinvestiga ting@hotmail. comDate: Fri, 16 Nov 2007 13:17:01 +=
0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] for rod or eric or whatever your name is


You have =
been a member of this group since 2004 and still have no idea what it's abo=
ut ? As far as me not watching ghost shows on tv, it seems by your explanat=
ion of how you have been involved in the PI field that you are a lot like t=
hose cheesy ghost hunting shows. To make a statement that spirits are not i=
nteractive and could care less about us or what we are trying to do, that a=
lone shows you know nothing. I am a disabled rescue worker injured in the 9=
11 attacks and am home all day with plenty of time for research and I can i=
mphatically tell you that they do pay attention they do interact they are d=
efinitely interested and they are working harder than we are to communicate=
. maybe you have formed your opinion because in your vast wealth of knowled=
ge and experience you have never come across a spirit that was interested i=
n you. besides throwing you all around a room or lifting you into the air a=
nd hurling you like a shot put or whatever you claim some ghosts did. And i=
f they did do that to you that sounds pretty interactive to me. I can see w=
hy they would want to throw you around and kick and bite you but if I where=
 you I would find another hobby.and I say hobby because by your analogy of =
it that's all it is to you.As far as your friend with the mini box, yeah I'=
m not stupid I figured that out, you can stop trying to defend it no one he=
re is gonna buy that piece of crap.I will not trade any more malicious post=
s with you so don't bother.BruceClimb to the top of the charts!  Play Star =
Shuffle:  the word scramble challenge with star power. Play Now! 

Be a bet=
ter pen pal. Text or chat with friends inside Yahoo! Mail. See how.
